channel.title: Excuse me, any admin? I found a mistake in the wiki!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Excuse me, any admin? I found a mistake in the wiki!" - Just found a little mistake, nothing too big, neither too small, but anyway, I'll note it!

item.title: Re: Excuse me, any admin? I found a mistake in the wiki!
item.content:encoded: We are working on updating the wiki now. That shall be fixed soon. Thank you for posting this.

item.title: Excuse me, any admin? I found a mistake in the wiki!
item.content:encoded: So I found a little mistake in the allies section. If you look at spot level 2, from his side, the dog pile bonus says: "+2 Range, +15% to Spot's Ability!". Now, on Red rover lvl.2's side, it says: "+2 Successes, +2 Range, +5% to Spot's Ability!" And if you take a look at the dog pile bonus page, it says: "+2 Range, Increases Spot ability to 15%!". See any differences yet? So, does it increase up to 15%? Does it ADD 15%? Does it add 5%? Does it add 2 successes? Yes or not? I don't know the answer since I haven't looped yet (soon gonna be, though!) but I know there has to be a mistake! Thank you for taking time to read my post.
